alert.note: Alert for Dane; Jefferson; Rock (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 20 at 4:29PM CDT until April 20 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN ROCK...SOUTHEASTERN DANE AND SOUTHWESTERN JEFFERSON COUNTIES... At 428 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Edgerton, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. Half dollar size hail was reported northeast of Footville in Rock County. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Eastern Madison, Stoughton, Fort Atkinson, Jefferson, McFarland, Lake Mills, Edgerton, Evansville, Cottage Grove, Johnson Creek, Deerfield, Cambridge, Lake Ripley, Lake Koshkonong, Fulton, Albion, Utica, Rockdale, Busseyville, and Cooksville. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for south central and southeastern Wisconsin. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
